bgDescription: A special firecracker made by following a secret blueprint found in Xisha. Refrain from using this in crowded areas as it is both powerful and loud.
description: A special firecracker sold at the Fireworks Shop. After equipping this to Utility, you can throw firecrackers to damage enemies. ()
